2024/8/12
**We are very sorry that this game is currently only available in Chinese and it is very difficult for us to release an English version with the current conditions. We apologize to the English users who were expecting an English version of this game.
**We've been inactive for a few years, but now we've formed a new organization: [PuriPuri Studio], and we're going to restart our activities in the near future by releasing more new hentai games, and in the future, we plan to make other multi-language versions of our games if the conditions allow it.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
